column1: ### "The Thermodynamic Properties of Aqueous Sulfuric Acid Solutions and Hydrates from 15 to 300 K."
### Journal of the American Chemical Society 1960 82 (1)
### a_H2O values determined with isopiestic method (fractionalo vapour pressure)
### Activity coefficient of water in sulfuric acid
### Concentrations in molal H2SO4 (mole H2SO4 per kg of solvent)
### Correction: a_H2O for c=1000 is reported as 1.50E-7. It clearly should be 1.50E-6
### gamma_H2SO4 is activity coefficient for H2SO4. Does it track with H_0?
### Note: a_H2O is "apparent mole fraction of water". gamma_H2O = a_H2O/X_H2O where X_H2O is actual mole fraction.
### Note: "%H2SO4" and "mole fraction" were calculated from the "conc H2SO4 / m" value.
